lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: I want to see other people have a chance to succeed in life.

lenders.name: Chad

lenders.occupational_info: I work to promote causes that serve the greater good and to advance the interests of those who are neither wealthy nor politcally powerful.

lenders.name: Yvonne

But I also know that, having grown up in Germany and living in the United States now, my idea of a struggle is miles away from what people in other countries have grown up to expect. I return in gratitude what is possible to me because of the kindness of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to beginning College students. They learn in my class how to write good papers for all their other classes and how to express themselves credibly and professionally so that they will be taken seriously in their careers.

lenders.name: Kristy-Ann

lenders.loan_because: Because I can

lenders.occupation: Real Estate Broker, Photographer, Jewelry Designer
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunities I have had in my life and wish the same for anyone else. What a nice way to assist people all over the world without making them feel that they are getting hand outs. Working towards world peace one step at the time.
lenders.occupational_info:
My Real Estate work involves helping people buy and sell their home. I understand the emotions that people may have when buying or selling their home and I try to step them through the process without to much upheaval.

My other two jobs are there to satisfy my creative and artistic side.

lenders.loan_because: I think this is a good and fair way to give people a chance to improve the quality of their own life and their environment.

As a not for profit charity we provide direct support for such activities as microfinance initiatives, land preservation as well as the development of community based conservancies.


We also seek to promote geographical knowledge through two primary channels: our Educational programs and by funding Grants for research, scientific expeditions and or conservation efforts.

lenders.name: Twenty2 Twenty9
lenders.loan_because: In this time of economic struggle, no one knows the hardship of financing a BIG DREAM like a salon owner. A personal friend who believed in Jim and I, loaned us the money to start our hair care line. Now it's our turn to help others. Big business wouldn't help us, the little man, so we will use our good fotune to help those like us.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a small, boutique hair salon. We created our own brand of hair care to sell, both retail and wholesale.
